function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disintegrated and non-interoperable data inhibits computer-assisted reasoning, hindering artificial intelligence.","Impact":"Limited ability to interpret and utilize data for precision medicine, therapeutic drugs, and preventive vaccines.","Mitigation":"Development of standardized data formats and interoperable systems, implementation of data integration strategies.","Technologies":"Ontologies, data integration platforms, interoperable data formats.","People":"Biomedical researchers, data scientists, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations, data science teams."},{"Description":"Lack of bioinformatics tools hinders integration and analysis of heterogeneous data and knowledge.","Impact":"Slows down the discovery of effective measures against coronaviruses and other contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Development of efficient and robust bioinformatics tools, implementation of data integration and analysis platforms.","Technologies":"Bioinformatics software, data integration platforms, data analysis algorithms.","People":"Biomedical researchers, data scientists, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations, bioinformatics teams."},{"Description":"Dependence on ontologies for data standardization and knowledge representation poses a single point of failure risk.","Impact":"Failure or compromise of ontologies can disrupt data standardization and integrative analysis.","Mitigation":"Diversification of data standardization methods, redundancy in knowledge representation systems.","Technologies":"Multiple ontologies, diverse data standardization techniques, redundant knowledge representation systems.","People":"Biomedical researchers, data scientists, healthcare professionals.","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations, data science teams."}]}
